hidden_orders: SELECT order_id FROM ridehistory.hidden_orders WHERE payment_tech_type = $4 AND payment_method_id = $5
orders: SELECT order_created_at, order_id FROM ridehistory.user_index WHERE ((NOT is_hidden) AND (payment_tech_type = $4 AND payment_method_id = $5)) AND ($8 IS NULL OR order_created_at > $8 AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')
